casebody.data:
Michelle NAPPI, Appellant,
v.
COMMUNITY ACCESS, INC. et al., Respondents. Court of Appeals of New York. May 2, 2019

Appeal dismissed without costs, by the Court sua sponte, upon the ground that no appeal lies as of right from the unanimous order of the Appellate Division absent the *143direct involvement of a substantial constitutional question (see CPLR 5601 ).
